-- Table `projectbbdd`.`types`

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectbbdd`.`types` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `element` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 3
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb3;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `projectbbdd`.`medias`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectbbdd`.`medias` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `description` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `urls` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `Types_id` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `Types_id`),
  INDEX `fk_Medias_Types1_idx` (`Types_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Medias_Types1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Types_id`)
    REFERENCES `projectbbdd`.`types` (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 40
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb3;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `projectbbdd`.`sections`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectbbdd`.`sections` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 11
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb3;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `projectbbdd`.`sections_has_medias`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectbbdd`.`sections_has_medias` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `Sections_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Medias_Id` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`, `Sections_id`, `Medias_Id`),
  INDEX `fk_Sections_has_Medias_Medias1_idx` (`Medias_Id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_Sections_has_Medias_Sections_idx` (`Sections_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Sections_has_Medias_Medias1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Medias_Id`)
    REFERENCES `projectbbdd`.`medias` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Sections_has_Medias_Sections`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Sections_id`)
    REFERENCES `projectbbdd`.`sections` (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 40
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb3;
